title: Verify policy ordering for dlp based policy
custom_steps:
Create a DLP file profile with MIP instance selected
Select data classification label as general/Public/Personal and sublabel
Create an inline policy - P1 with the above dlp profile 
Create an inline policy - P2 with the pii/pci profile 
Upload a file with the right label so as to hit this policy P1
Upload a file with dlp/pii/pci content so as to hit this policy P2
custom_expected:
Verify Policy P1 gets hit when file with the right label is uploaded
Verify Policy P2 gets hit when file with pii/pci content is uploaded
Verify SkopeIT event is generated for this policy hit
Verify application event on skopeIT for DLP is showing up data classfication vendor and label details
